General.Name: Zinitix Co.Ltd
General.Description: Zinitix Co., Ltd manufactures and sells system ICs in South Korea and internationally. It offers touch screen controller ICs, auto focus driver ICs, haptic driver ICs, and motor driver ICs. The company's products are used in smart phones, tablet PC, laptop PCs, home appliances, and automotive industry. Zinitix Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is based in Yongin-si, South Korea.
